snippet.title: Oxygen Not Included: The Frosty Planet Pack DLC Launch ❄️ [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
❄️The Frosty Planet Pack DLC is now available: https://klei.gg/FrostyPlanetPackDLC The Duplicants are facing their chilliest challenge yet! In The Frosty Planet Pack DLC, you'll excavate the frigid landscape of a brand-new starting planet to explore new biomes, master thermoregulation and harness new technology to build a megacolony that can truly conquer the elements.

The Frosty Planet Pack includes:

🚀Explore a brand-new starting planet, excavate the frozen landscape, and gather cold-resistant plants for sustenance.

🧑‍🌾Harvest peculiar cold-resistant plants not found anywhere else in the universe.

🔬Discover new elements and unlock new buildings that help manage frozen resources and keep your Duplicants toasty.

💅Customize your colony with a selection of new cosmetic skins that make everything from clothing to furniture feel cozier and more rustic.

❄️New curious critters who have useful things to teach colonies about adapting to this glacial environment.

Check out the full details and FAQ on our news post here: https://klei.gg/FrostyPlanetPackDetails

-------------------------------------------
